casebody.data:
PEOPLE ex rel. COYLE, Relator, v. MARTIN et al., Police Commissioners, Respondents. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. May 1, 1893.) Certiorari by John S. Coyle against James J. Martin and others, police commissioners, to review the judgment of the police board of New York city dismissing relator from the police force. Writ dismissed.

Argued before SEDGWICK, C. J., and FREEDMAN and McADAM, JJ.

Wm. H. Clark, for relator. L. J. Grant, for respondents. PER CURIAM.

The, judgment should be affirmed, and the writ dismissed, with §50 costs and disbursements to the respondents.
